hasDitaContent.@value: Voriconazole increases the anticoagulant effect of warfarin. Manufacturer advises monitor INR and adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Voriconazole   increases   the anticoagulant effect of   warfarin .  Manufacturer advises monitor INR and adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Xipamide is predicted to cause hypokalaemia (potentially increasing the risk of torsade de pointes) when given with voriconazole. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Xipamide   is predicted to   cause   hypokalaemia (potentially increasing the risk of torsade de pointes) when given with   voriconazole .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Voriconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to zopiclone. Manufacturer advises adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Voriconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   zopiclone .  Manufacturer advises adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both voriconazole and zuclopenthixol prolong the QT interval. Most manufacturers advise avoiding the use of two or more drugs that are associated with QT prolongation. Increasing age, female sex, cardiac disease, and some metabolic disturbances (notably hypokalaemia) predispose to QT prolongation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  voriconazole  and  zuclopenthixol  prolong the QT interval. Most manufacturers advise avoiding the use of two or more drugs that are associated with QT prolongation. Increasing age, female sex, cardiac disease, and some metabolic disturbances (notably hypokalaemia) predispose to QT prolongation.
